title: Availability
description: An object describing the availability of a set of elements.

bufferView.description: Index of a buffer view that indicates whether each element is available. The bitstream is a 1D boolean array. If an element is available, its bit is 1, and if it is unavailable, the bit is 0.

constant.description: Integer indicating whether all of the elements are available (1) or all are unavailable (0).
